Budd (Sidewinder)


You're Budd! You're Bill's kid brother, though you don't talk to him very much anymore. You're a good liar, and a good fighter. Sadly, you have a weak spot for money and greed, and it will eventually be your downfall. You're always trying to prove yourself to the world, and will do anything to make them notice how important you are.

who the fuck is this band jet?  and why do they look like the buzzcocks?  man, music is total shit these days.  there's tons of good bands out there and nobody sees them.  nobody sees the star spangles cause they're playing the lager house the same night as fucking three days grace. i now remember why i gave up working for record labels.  monsters...

so i can drive a car.  i can handle a boat up to 20 feet as long as i've got someone with me.  i think it's time i learn to fly a plane.  some of you may think this idea is "far fetched" and "a bad idea". please let me remind you that even though i live in near abject poverty, i've still been able to feed insane habits such as buying records nearly everyday and collecting every Batman and Spiderman comic.  so i want to learn to fly a plane.  actually i want to drink a six pack while flying a plane.

listen!  it's either this or i start buying guns.

no quick movements...

careful...

when i was growing up (ages 1-14) i lived in a super Polish neighborhood on the south west side.  there was a bakery next to my house and a fruit market around the corner.  between the two of them they had 5 different kinds of ceral and only one kind of milk.  the vegtables were huge and cheap and the bread was always fresh.  there were guys there that knew what i came in for as soon as i walked through the door (i later learned that my mom would call beforehand) and, at the time to an 8 year old that seemed like magic.  so this all leads me to one conclusion...

fuck farmer jack.

i can never find anything.  they only have one kind of real butter and it's in sticks.  i wandered around for 15 minutes looking for thai noodles.  there's no way you could find the ramen unless you had a treasure map.  as soon as i walk in all my ideas of "running in real quick and grabbing somrthing" go out the window.  i usually feel so fucking helpless that i just buy pierogi and get the fuck out.  i hate that place so much. assholes.

and that's why i'm eatting chex mix at 10 am.

my cell bill for last month is $850.
HOLY FUCKING GOD!!
$850!

i need drugs.  feed me pills.

those of you who're around me often better get used to me somoking a pipe again.  dear ol' bob bought me a pound of russian cavendish.  shit's good...

anyway happy anti-valentines day.  I was supposed to go out but i fell asleep.  woke up at about midnight to miranda knocking on my door with sushi and a bottle. so i sat around with miranda drinking a bottle of port and watching French Kiss.  not a bad night, just a sleepy one.
HA!! if anyone EVER sees me dressed like this again please feel free to cut me open...

so i finally remembered my password.  i guess i could've had it sent to me but i didn't want
look like a fool.  i imagine somewhere at the other end that email there would have been a
LYNX user wearing a silver surfer t-shirt, eating 2 day old taco bell while watching anime
porn thinking "wow, this guy can't remember his own password!  what a fool!".

anyway, the drinking is going good; the job is going bad.  snow turns a normally poopy
day into a veritable shit storm.  running late, car sliding, me going place i usually don't,
people going to places i usually go to.  not good.  

parties however are a good time. unless however the host drunkenly begs you to make
pierogi and, well, you do it cause you're polish and you've got this thing about pierogi. 
and then you get to the party and the girl you were hoping to see isn't there and the girl
you used to like is there and when you talk to her she holds your hand.  so then you drink
and ignore her, right?  RIGHT?!  mmm... thought so.

somewhere, in a house down the street there's a man in a downward spiral.  somewhere,
people want me to believe cats are living in bottles.  what in the name of all fuck is this
world coming to?  

Calgone, take me away.

here's to doing something harmless on friday night...
AND, here's to not throwing up in your bathtub...

so the past few days have been strange beyond description.  therefore i'm not going to describe them.  i will say that my job is driving me crazy.  i mean, i get pissed driving under normal conditions and that just 15 to a half hour to the store or my dads or st andrews or a bar.  now it seems i'm driving 5-6 hours a day and i'm going to really far away places.  hmm...
anyway, i like the job but i don't seem to be adjusting.  back to retail?  maybe...  in other news, i'm once again in a self- destructive relationship, enjoying it greatly yet in constant fear of some sort of violet outbust from the other party.  
also, the strokes have a Tron theme in their new video making me hate them all the more.

so here goes. went to Yipsi to run interferance for E.  ended up drinking sugar-water malt bervy cause the first store didn't have liquor (although, the next one did).  Watched Willy Wonka with a couple of kids who were in grade school around the time i turned 21.  also watched my doods show their asses by making out with substandard girls. there was also a kid that was willing to throw himself from the porch into a tree for a dollar.  i gave him three.  then ol' boy decided it was time to go, went into the hallway and started putting holes in the drywall and decapitating the banister.  by the time we were all packed up doods were yelling about cocks being blocked, ol' boy announced we were "even" (for what i don't know) and i was stone cold sober.  oh, and that was my third time in Yipsi that day.

is it strange to be up at 2am eatting wasabi chips with your cat while trying to get protools to normalize a flanged recording of a billy holiday 10"?

well color me strange, uncle bingo, color me strange...

i swear to god the next person to get me drunk dies.  do you people know what my liver looks like?  it's black people. black from use.
so i saw belle and sebastian tonight and i lost my mind due to booze.  i yelled at a little polish girl, told another polish girl to get lost and ended up at something called the "dirty little prince party".  WHAT THE HELL IS THAT ABOUT?!
no more booze.  i'm serious.  i've got a blade. serious. bigger...

spiritualized needs to stop. not only is the guy from chasm not playing drums on this tour, but the fucking singer sat down the whole time. what an asshole. i think i saw him stuffing mcnuggents into his mouth between songs. and i'm really, really tired of rock bands saying they're gospel bands.  alright, i'll let the make-up slide casue they're fucking sweet, but all the others can kiss my ass.  delta 72 is guilty too.  someone tells you that you sound like booker t and the m.g.s you don't say "that cause we're a gospel band brother".  shut the fuck up and play green onions.  oh and the soledad brothers?  yea, fuck them.  they ripped off null and void.  assholes.  these smelly assholes should also be forbidden from putting the word "the" before their name. "hey dude, we smell.  we could call ourselves the trouser pie. woo, praise the lord, pass the Beam"
so star wars: knights of the old republic has me in some kind of trance.

i woke up about 45 minutes ago in a cold sweat.  i had a really disturbing dream and it seems to be hanging out.  i mean, i can't remember what it was about but i've got this sense of dread hanging over me.  anyhow, the mum show is this evening and i'm not looking forward to it as much as i was.  ticket sales are in the toilet and everyone thinks it should've been at another venue.  plus, i've got no guest list for it, so some kids are showing their true colors.  it's always nice when someone you think of fondly bitches cause you can't get them into a ten dollar show.

and here's the topper.  the iggy makeup show is on monday.  so is liz phair.  fuck...

so during the great blackout of '03 i heard on my little radio that, in these times of crisis, we all need to use our skills to help out.  after careful consideration i decided to use my uncanny power to get drunk in any situation to lend a hand.

fuck man, we made water baloons, sprayed everything we could find with hoses and drank enough vodka to kill 4 cows.  AND we didn't ever need a new drunken battle cry.  Ironically "I'm helping..." seemed to fit the bill.
holy fuck, i got a call back from Nintendo.  i swear to god if i get this job i'm getting a Link tattoo.

so i'm watching jackass and a commercial comes on for Vans.  this little alterna-fuck in a padded cell pops a tape into his walkman and pushes play.  American Nightmare by the Misfits starts playing and our altrna-fuck is magically transported to snow covered slope for one verse of one of my favorite songs. the Misfits. in a commercial.  on MTV...

DANZIG YOU DICK!!!  i know you own the rights BITCH-TITS!

awful bastard, terrible fuck-ass...

my friend nikki jackson was killed in a car crash today on her way back from portland.  if any of you knew her and would like funeral info you can call me 313.779.2084

fuck.  i've have no idea what else to say.

my roommate's gone for 3 weeks.  21 days of movie watching freedom. no one blabbing at me that they've seen this one or that they don't like french movies or that Miami Vice is on and he must watch AND tape it.  the first movie i watch? Bad Boys.  how sad is that?

Why do drunk people always come to my house?  Gabby and Joann show up last night crocked out of their heads dragging a bag with a lot of booze in it.  it's like i'm a beacon for drunks and weirdos.
watching cartoon network with a couple of drunks is cool and all but i was kinda hoping to go out.  plus, i broke the air conditioning control so it's a steady 63 degrees in my house ALL THE TIME.  i slept with a hoodie on.

thai food the second day is terrible.  my drunken noodle has the texture and taste of wood.

who needs a drink...
go see Pirates of the Caribbean.  it's the fucking BOMB!!!!

well, my birthday has come and gone with only minimal damage to my liver.  i left my sweltering job at 8:15, was home by 8:45 and was abducted from by home at around 9:15 by about 17 of my nearest and dearest.  no gory details (in the hope of not tipping anyone off as to who is responsible for damages inflicted on their home, bar, concert hall etc.) but a good time, and at least 5 different kinds of liquor, was had by all.  i can hardly wait to turn thirty.  on THAT day, this city will pay with the blood of it's children.

i am never ever wearing a bauhaus shirt in the royal oak/ferndale area again.  it's like a beacon for fat girls.  they were out in force.  ever record store in the area was packed with these whale-in-a-fishnet gorilla women.  "I really like Peter Murphy alot" she says in a vioce not unlike Darth Vader.  why are all the little cute girls indie rockers?  i mean, there used to be little goth cutie pies.  what happened to these girls?  maybe they heard  bauhaus and it inspired them to start eatting  bearclaws by the case.  fuck...

So after three days and two nights at good ol' henry ford hospital my doctor tells me that the medication I'm on is killing me.  He says that if I keep taking it I could be dead in 18 months.  He also asked me if I'd like to stay on it, which I thought was nice.  Exploring my options n shit.  Anyway, the whole experience has rekindled my love for soup and made me hate male nurses.  

I also think I need new jobs.  At one of my jobs I am paid poorly but am expected to handle every little problem.  The other job is pretty much the same except it pays a little better.  I'd like a job where my rate of pay is directly affected by the amount of effort I put into my job.  Maybe I should work on commission somewhere?  Would anybody actually buy a used car from me?

Oh!  I saw MTV Cribs while in the hospital and I think I'd get along really well with Robbie Williams.

so, i've worn either converse all stars for as long as i can remember.  i also discovered i have 7 pairs of black Van's from working all those Warped Tours.  these shoes have totally changed my outlook on footwear.  it's nice to walk in a puddle and not get my foot soaked.

i also found a spyder turner 78 the other day for $3.

the french girl is a fake.  not that she's not french; she's french as salted horse meat.  she's
just not as french as she lets on.  does that make sense?  i mean, come on, school in 3
different countries and she still has a thick french accent?  

no way.  

she was on the phone today and her accent faded to  almost nothing.  i mean, you could
hear she was french, but there was no awkward "how do you say?" going on.  it was
concise conversation, straight and to the point.  she hangs up and it's back to the french
kitten act. so, there's a snag in the conversation as to why i have to work sunday.  she
pretends there's some great language barrier, and i call her on it.

"Bah-at, Ro-bear, zees iz oww ah talk!"

i think it's an act and say so.  then the tears start (how can european woman burst into
tears and then give you that miserable scowl that makes you feel stupid for having thought
that you were the cause?) and i give in.  

am i an asshole?  am i sabotaging my chances of a relationship with an amazing woman
again?  has it ever crossed my mind that i probably would never have been interested in
her had she not been french, AND SHE MIGHT KNOW THAT?  is she playing up to my
Amelie fantasy that she scoffs at every chance she gets? ("you wont cute tings?  you go do
cute tings.  leaf mah out off yer silly-kneez")
am i getting what i want and throwing it away?  

why hasn't she met my friends?

why am i drinking so much lately?

so i woke up this morning and my room smelled like and air freshener factory.  it was like
glade had opened up shop and was going for the gold.  in fact, my speed stick has failen
down by the heat vent and melted.  so now there's this warm, sticky, nice smelling puddle
on my floor cause i don't know how to turn the heat off.  what gets deodorant out of shag
carpet?

i believe i am once again dragged into hipster bullshit because of someone's inability to
separate drunken sarcasm from drunken violence.  am i really so interesting that my rants
become a topic of discussion among the intellectual midgets and total failures that
comprise some sort of "scene" in Detroit?  

plus my roomate cat is in heat and i want her dead...

miller high life light is nasty...
so are coney dogs...
together they make me want to die.  aside from that today was fairly sweet.  I've discovered that i can get lots of stuff done on my day off if i decide i only have a few things to do.  got cool records and a new/old zelda game.  now it's time for sleep...

giffer...

I need to quit my job, stop working shows, and quit drinking.  I'll just play video games all day.  ignorance is sexy.

miss Em's last journal entry has reminded me of my love for the platypus.  

	The platypus is one of the two animals in the order Monotremata. It is the only member of the mammal family Ornithorhynchidae. Platypus is from the Greek platys meaning broad and pous meaning foot, referring to the animal's webbed foot. 
	The platypus has several reptilian characteristics which include using the same opening for reproduction and eliminating waste products, the ability to lay eggs, cervical ribs, and local ascorbic acid synthesis in the kidney.
        Even though the platypus has these reptile characteristics, it is overall much more mammalian than reptilian. This unique animal has a lifespan of 10 to 15 years. 
	The platypus is about the size of a household cat. The male platypus's body is about 50 - 60 centimeters long and the female is about 40 - 50 centimeters long. An adult male platypus weighs about 2 kilograms and a female platypus weighs about .9 kilograms. 
	The platypus has a thick covering of waterproof hair all over its body except for the feet and bill. The outer hair is a dark brown with yellowish hair on its underside. There are about 800 hairs per square millimeter. This is denser than the fur of the river otter or polar bear. The platypus has two layers of hair. The top or longer layer is a shiny guard fur with a woolly short
fur undercoat. The thermal qualities of the fur allow the platypus to withstand cold temperatures. 
	The platypus's sensitive, pliable bill is a blue-gray, blackish color with the two nostril holes near the tip. The location of the nostrils allows the platypus to breath while the rest of the body remains under the water surface. The lower bill is smaller than the upper bill. The lower bill is held in place by two elongated dentary bones which is found in all mammals. The bill contains an electro-receptor system which has approximately 850,000 electrical and tactile receptors. When the platypus goes underwater or drives for food, it closes its ears, eyes, and nostrils. Its electro-receptor system detects the
electric currents created by the muscle activity of small prey and may even help the platypus detect the electric field created when water flows over prey hidden under rocks, mud, and small debris. As the platypus gathers food in its
mouth, it moves the food to its cheek pouches. When it returns to the surface, it pushes the food from its cheek pouches up to its mouth. It then grinds it with its grinding pads. 
	The ear openings or grooves are on either side of the platypus's head.  The platypus does not have external ears. These openings are closed when diving or swimming under water. Out of the water these ear openings are very sensitive to sounds. 
	The small, beady eyes are very sensitive to movement. Cone cells have been found in the retina. This indicates the possibility of color vision for the platypus. Its eyes are well placed for scanning river banks. 
	The platypus has four legs which extend horizontally from its body. This arrangement makes it walk on land with a shuffle like a lizard. The front feet have large webs of skin which help to propel the platypus through the water. The platypus swims with alternate strokes of the front legs. On land the webs fold back revealing the sharp claws which are used for walking and
digging burrows. The back partially webbed feet have a series of sharp, curved claws which help to steer and balance the platypus when it is swimming. The claws are also used to anchor the animal while digging and to clean its fur and to help keep its fur waterproof. 
	The paddle-like tail of the platypus is broad and flat. It is used as a rudder when swimming and to push the soil within the burrow when tunneling. Its main purpose is to store fat for when food supplies are low or when the platypus needs more energy to incubate eggs. A plump tail is a sign of good health. 
	The body temperature of most mammals is 37 to 38 degrees Celsius. The body temperature of a platypus is about 32 degrees Celsius. This reduces
the rate at which the platypus loses body heat in the water. 
        The platypus's red blood cells carry larger amounts of hemoglobin than any other mammal. This allows the platypus to go without air for longer periods. The heart rate of a platypus can drop from 140 - 230 beats a minute to almost 0 beats per minute. 
	Males and females reach sexual maturity at the age of two years. Only the left ovary of the female platypus functions. The other ovary is poorly developed and does not function. This characteristic also occurs in birds. After mating the female leaves the male and lays two to three eggs in a nesting burrow. The eggs of the platypus have large yolks and rubbery shells like reptile eggs. When the babies hatch they nurse from the female's milk glands. The babies do not leave the burrow until they are about 17 weeks old.  Only young platypuses have rudimentary teeth which are replaced with bony plates. 
	The platypus is the world's only venomous furred animal. All platypuses are born with spurs on their hind feet. The spurs on the female fall off after the first year. The spurs on males become venomous during the breeding season. 
	Platypuses are capable of making sounds. These sounds have been compared to a puppy growling.

i had a hot dog yesterday. really salty. it was wrapped in a pita.  i think i'd like to try the whole hot dog in a bun thing.  then i could put stuff on it like mustard and pickles and relish and stuff like that.  mmm

i've often read that the more you do something the easier it gets.  i don't think this is true of everything.  the more people i meet, the more i want to be by myself.  or maybe just one on one with somebody.  yea, that's it; groups of these new people are harder to swallow.  maybe i should start giving out some sort of personality resume.  

I was in line at the drug store today (buying drugs) and this kid in a crass shirt comes up to me and asks "are you punk rock?"  I don't think there was anything particularly "punk" about me at the time, maybe it was the boots i don't know.  anyway, if i were "punk" i would probably have told this kid to fuck himself.  i didn't.  i felt bad for what's ahead of him.  high school, college, that one girl who's gonna fuck his head up for a few years.  i just sort of shrugged it off with an "i guess".  yet another new person i didn't want to deal with.  although i am dealing with him i guess.  

picture the whole world as a house.  each room is a country.  each drawer or closet or box is a region of this country.  now consider a book in a box in the drawer in a dresser in a closet. in that book is a picture of that kid from high school that you used to smoke pot with.  that's one persons position in relation to the rest of the world.  

my job is to sell the past to the present.  you buy a record from some bum for $2.  you clean it, resleeve it, put a nice plastic protector over it,  and sell it to an automotive engineer for $40.  happens every day.

i love records.  they seem more personal than cds.  I put on coltrane's "naima" yesterday and i started wondering what he was thinking about while he was playing.  i mean, i think about all sorts of stuff while i'm doing my job.  was he thinking "this sounds great" or "i gotta get some milk on the way home"?  sad thing is he was probably thinking about morphine.  fuck.  a cd could never put me on that train of thought. never.

...and i was sad to see her go.
how can you not get sick of someone after talking to them for nine hours?

i think i like french movies so much because of all the fucking proverbs.  and the french are always fucking with each other.  cuting a shoe lace too short.  not throwing a pebble.  maybe that's why american movies have gotten so dull, no pratical jokes.  i have yet to see someone trying to outrun a fireball in a french movie.  if there was a fireball in a french move it would burn the people to a crisp and then an old man would pop up and say "and this is life.  burned and scorched now on the outside as they were inside."  that alone would make it sweet.

i need a haircut.  bad.  see, the problem is my barber is never around.  and she somehow turned her cell phone to silent and can't turn it back.  i used to have the same phone so i understand.  i switched mine to japanese once and had to take it to the service center feeling like a schmuck.  anyway, i digress.  haircut. soon...

once again i have told somebody the truth and they will never speak to me again. remember, truth hurts.  may also cause tears, cursing, shoving and death threats. oh, and diarrhea.  truth causes diarrhea.

something good and harmless better happen soon...

still sick.  i was feeling better so i went out for some fun.  this "fun" ended up with us drinking on the roof in the balmey Michigan winter.  thus i am once again under the weather.  

i wish i had some poison sushi... fugu?  is that it?

i'm sick.  sicker than i've been in a long time.  if anyone want to come take care of me please do so.  anyone but angela.  actually anyone but angela and karen.  okay, everyone stay the fuck away from me.  i'm armed...

"i'm no good with people.  everytime someone talks to me i want to jump out the window.  or take an elevator straight down" -chinaski
